message: callback building single time consuming method rubocop around overall processing currently build new commissionner every file could optimized easy config change commissioner must know cop need responding node type previous method thus file cop type type number node type encountered typical file testing file 200 typical rubocop file calculated type 22.5 currently cop 422 new algorithm type instead number type cop responds average cop run 1.8 optimized cache building almost faster overall gain 6.6 also advantage adding new callback zero impact cache building note like add on_after_send etc see 8844 downside list callback default cached per cop class mean cop somehow relies adding callback responds runtime incompatible single cop doe see 8881 solution include modifying callback case could done adding empty method on_send etc. even though would overriden extending module overriding cop base although marked api private tested performance  stackprof tmp stackprof.dump text method rubocop cop commissioner sample 1039 self 7.5 1104 total 8.0 stackprof tmp stackprof.dump text method rubocop cop commissioner sample self 0.2 180 total 1.4

message: add new rail cop feature cop check redundant receiver with_options receiver implicit rail 4.2 higher bad case ruby class account with_options dependent destroy assoc assoc.has_many customer assoc.has_many product assoc.has_many invoice assoc.has_many expense end end  good case ruby class account with_options dependent destroy has_many customer has_many product has_many invoice has_many expense end end  use console cat app model account.rb true class account with_options dependent destroy assoc assoc.has_many customer assoc.has_many product assoc.has_many invoice assoc.has_many expense end end  console rubocop tmp app model account.rb rail inspecting file  offense tmp app model account.rb rail redundant receiver with_options assoc.has_many customer  tmp app model account.rb rail redundant receiver with_options assoc.has_many product  tmp app model account.rb rail redundant receiver with_options assoc.has_many invoice  tmp app model account.rb rail redundant receiver with_options assoc.has_many expense  file inspected offense detected  information api documentation http with_options

author: ohn Backus <johncbackus@gmail.com>
message: use multiline example rewrite script require rubocop include rubocop ast sexp class rewritter extend rubocop nodepattern macro def_node_search match pattern block send nil str args begin send nil inspect_source send nil cop send dstr strip_indent send send nil expect send send nil cop offense send nil be_empty pattern def initialize path path path source rubocop path.to_s 2.4 rewriter parser source rewriter.new source.buffer end def match match source.ast .any end def rewrite return unless match count match source.ast args count rewrite_one args end rewritten put rewrote count entry path path.write rewritten end private attr_reader source rewriter path def rewrite_one body inspect_call spec_cop example_source expectation heredoc_start replacement heredoc_start .strip_indent   .join replacement end end pathname.glob spec rubocop cop .rb .each path rewritter.new path .rewrite end

author: ohn Backus <johncbackus@gmail.com>
message: rewrite spec use rewrite script require rubocop include rubocop ast sexp class rewritter extend rubocop nodepattern macro def_node_search match pattern block send nil str args begin send nil inspect_source send nil cop str send send nil expect send send nil cop offense send nil be_empty pattern def initialize path path path source rubocop path.to_s 2.4 rewriter parser source rewriter.new source.buffer end def match match source.ast .any end def rewrite return unless match count match source.ast args count rewrite_one args end rewritten put rewrote count entry path path.write rewritten end private attr_reader source rewriter path def rewrite_one spec_body example_source     end end pathname.glob spec rubocop cop .rb .each path rewritter.new path .rewrite end

message: improve performance node node_parts method profiling    mode cpu 1000 sample 11760 0.01 miss rate 838 7.13  total pct sample pct frame 1015 8.6 1015 8.6 block level class node 1435 12.2 727 6.2 parser lexer advance 597 5.1 597 5.1 rubocop ast sendnode node_parts   sendnode node_parts method account cpu time fix  equal x.to_a x.to_a faster replaced x.to_a benchmark  micro benchmark  ruby require benchmark require parser current node parser foo.bart baz raise unless node node.to_a benchmark.bm x.report node 10000000.times node x.report node.to_a 10000000.times node.to_a end  bash ruby test.rb user system total real node 1.300000 0.000000 1.300000 1.293447 node.to_a 0.310000 0.000000 0.310000 0.312420  benchmark command execution  ruby bench.rb require benchmark origin master def run_master system rubocop _0.48.1.master_ cache false force default config dev null end pull request branch def run_improvement system rubocop cache false force default config dev null end benchmark.bm x.report master 5.times run_master x.report improvement 5.times run_improvement end  bash path rubocop ruby path bench.rb user system total real master 0.000000 0.000000 195.480000 195.510623 improvement 0.000000 0.000000 189.820000 189.841417  rubocop command faster around

message: add new style cop 3984 example  ruby good begin foo end bad begin foo end  note  cop doe detect following code ruby begin foo empty line rescue bar end begin foo rescue empty line bar end begin foo empty line ensure bar end  two reason first feature implemented check method defined mixin second think feature implemented another cop e.g style would like check empty line around begin end block body always however add empty line around ensure rescue else keywords sometimes ruby begin foo bar baz rescue something end  feature separateness disable one implement cop empty line around keywords another

message: permit semantic style block syntax http github.com bbatsov rubocop issue 1600 http github.com bbatsov ruby style guide issue 162 http 2011 block convention ruby add configuration option style block cop permit two style current default semantic semantic rule described link semantic style enabled allows multi line block brace block considered functional current implementation check whether return value block used classify functional performs following check return value block assigned return value block sent message return value block last thing scope cover following semantic style use case  foo map    map  .inspect  block foo map   end  put map   add offense return value block used ... end used instead intention revealing ... conversely return value block used add offense ... used instead ... end method functional procedural categorised usage alone add configurable list permit method rspec core functional appears procedural tap procedural appears functional method functional procedural lambda categorised usage add configurable list ignored method dsl often use ... end e.g rspec.describe add offense block ... end even though could potentially return value outer scope e.g rspec.describe foo blah ... end end
